text: ta(gm) SRuqtaM BUqtama#juhOqd-yaddhAqnABi#r. hAriyOjaqna(gg) SrIqNAti# SRutaqtvAya# SRuqtamEqvaina#M BUqtaM ju#hOti baqhvIBi#H SrINAtyEqtAva#tI-rEqvAsyAq-muShmi#n ~MlOqkE kA#maqduGA# BavaqntyathOq KalvA#hurEqtA vA indra#syaq pRuSna#yaH kAmaqduGAq yaddhA#riyOjaqnIritiq tasmA$d-baqhvIBi#H SrINIyAdRuKsAqmE vA indra#syaq harI# sOmaqpAnauq tayO$H pariqdhaya# AqdhAnaqM ~Myadapra#hRutya pariqdhI-~jju#huqyA-daqntarA#dhAnAByAM- [  ] 33
